Headline: Green Line No trains between Harlem and Ashland/Lake
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Harlem and Ashland/Lake due to track switching problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Harlem and Ashland/Lake due to track switching problems.

As a result, trains are operating only between 63rd Terminals and Ashland/Lake at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Harlem and Ashland/Lake to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Board the Pink Line at Ashland/Lake for continuing service to the Loop.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to track switching problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to track switching problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as the #97 Skokie bus, or using buses to other rail lines.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.
